org.modelio.api.module.commands

Class DefaultModuleCommandHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.api.module.commands.DefaultModuleCommandHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModuleCommandHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplyPatternStandardHandler, ElementCreationStandardHandler, RunJythonScriptBasicHandler

    public abstract class DefaultModuleCommandHandler
extends Object
implements IModuleCommandHandler
    Default implementation of the IModuleCommandHandler interface.

    This default implementation may be inherited by the module developers in order to simplify the code writing of a contextual command.

      • findStereotypeFromSpec

        public final Stereotype findStereotypeFromSpec(IModule module,
                                               MClass metaclass,
                                               String stereotypeSpec)
        Find the stereotype from a stereotype specification.

        The stereotype specification may have one of the following formats:

        • stereotype name
        • module name#stereotype name
        • module regex#stereotype name
        • module regex#stereotype regex
        Returns null if the specification is null or the stereotype is not found.
        Parameters:
        module - the module
        metaclass - the metaclass to look from
        stereotypeSpec - the stereotype specification
        Returns:
        the found stereotype or null.
